name: Banpresto Dragon Ball Son Gohan Blood Of Saiyans Super Figure 12 cm
description:
Banpresto Presents For The Line Of Figures Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero Blood Of Saiyans Specialxiii This Figure Of Gohan Super Saiyan, Based On The Popular Manga And Anime Dragon Ball Super. This Pvc Figure Is About 12 Cm Tall And Includes A Special Support Base For Display. The Dragon Ball Figure Collection Gives The Collector The Opportunity To Have High-Quality Figures Of Their Favorite Characters. In Them We Focus On Recreating Exactly Both The Physical Appearance Of The Character And His Character. The Ultimate Goal Is That You Can Have In Your Collection Of Dragon Ball Figures An Exact Recreation Of The Character That Has Made Us Experience So Many Exciting Moments. Banpresto Is One Of The Largest Japanese Figure Manufacturers Worldwide. Belonging To The Bandai Spirits Group, This Company Offers A Unique Value For Money. It Currently Has Multiple Different Lines So That All Fans Can Have A Figure In Their Collection That Suits Their Way Of Enjoying The World Of Figures. Quality, Detail And, Above All, An Entrepreneurial Spirit Make Banpresto The WorldÂ´s Largest Figure Company, Offering Hundreds Of Figures From Different Franchises Every Month Such As Dragon Ball, One Piece, Naruto, Sword Art Online. So That We Can All Enjoy Our Hobby At The Highest Level Without Spending A Lot On Each Figure.


Specifications:
- License: Dragon Ball Super
- Manufacturer: Banpresto (Bandai Spirits)
- Height: 12 Cm
- Collection: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero Blood Of Saiyans Specialxiii
